results.title: Rockwells Long at White House Are Now at the Heart of a Family Dispute
results.abstract: Relatives of Franklin D. Roosevelt’s press secretary are feuding over ownership of illustrations by Norman Rockwell that once hung in a hallway near the Oval Office.
